entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight then periods of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
